title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 32.11 - Prescribed forms for id cards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 32.11 - Prescribed forms for id cards

State Regulations

Each ID card, including the FS-75 specified by section
32.15
of this Part, shall be
printed and issued in full accordance with the specifications prescribed by
this Part in substantially the following form: (a) Permanent FS-20: Front print only
(See: Section
32.16
of this Part)
(b) Permanent FS-20: Pre-printed
back

Front (See: Appendix 32-2)

Back (See: Section
32.16
of this Part)
(c) Temporary FS-21: Front print
only
(See: Section
32.16
of this Part)
(d) Temporary FS-21: Pre-printed
back

Front (See: Section
32.16
of this Part)

Back (See: Section
32.16
of this Part)
(e) Permanent Bonded FS-83: Front
print only
(See: Section
32.16
of this Part)
(f) Permanent Bonded FS-83: Pre-printed back

Front (See: Section
32.16
of this Part)

Back (See: Section
32.16
of this Part)
(g) Permanent FH-1: Front print
only
(See Section
32.16
of this Part)
(h) Permanent FH-1: Pre-printed
back

Front (See: Section
32.16
of this Part)

Back (See: Section
32.16
of this Part)
(i) Permanent Bonded FH-1B: Front
print only
(See: Section
32.16
of this Part)
(j) Permanent Bonded FH-1B: Pre-printed back

Front (See: Section
32.16
of this Part)

Back (See: Section
32.16
of this Part)
(k) Permanent Self-Insurer FS-80: Front print only
(See: Section
32.16
of this Part)
(l) Permanent Security Depositor
FS-79: Front print only
(See: Section
32.16
of this Part)

of this Part)

Self-Insurer FH-3
(See: Section

of this

Part)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
